title: Crash
description: Danni and Mercer head out west to Montana. Back to the remains of the once mighty Black Ice Motorcycle Club. Mercer is bound and determined to get the gang back to it’s former glory, but while he is busy with the club, Danni is sinking further into loneliness and depression.That’s when she meets Cruz. He’s strong, he’s handsome, and he’s the newest member of Black Ice.
author: Rayna Bishop
